languages.text: {n}Великан ухмыляется и склоняет голову.{/n} "Когда придет время, я напомню тебе об этом обещании. Пути будущего все еще определяются... я не буду останавливать своих слуг от того, чтобы охотиться за тем, что нужно мне. Выживешь — заслужишь право служить Истине".

traits.locale_text: {n}Великан ухмыляется и качает головой.{/n} "Ничтожность своего бытия вы с лихвой восполняете иллюзией собственного величия. Ты — прах на пути меня и моих владык, а не т{mf|от|а}, кто будет удостоин равенства со мной".

languages.text: {n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."
languages.original_text: {n}Великан ухмыляется и склоняет голову.{/n} "Когда придет время, я напомню тебе об этом обещании. Пути будущего все еще определяются... я не буду останавливать своих слуг от того, чтобы охотиться за тем, что нужно мне. Выживешь — заслужишь право служить Истине".

traits.locale_text: {n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The ways of the future are still being determined... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

{n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The ways of the future are still being determined... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

{n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

{n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

{n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

{n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

languages.text: {n}Se ríe e inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Cuando llegue el momento, te recordaré esta promesa. Pero el destino no está escrito... no impediré que mis sirvientes busquen lo que necesito. Si sobrevives, te habrás ganado el derecho a servir a la Verdad».
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se ríe e inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Cuando llegue el momento, te recordaré esta promesa. Pero el destino no está escrito... no impediré que mis sirvientes busquen lo que necesito. Si sobrevives, te habrás ganado el derecho a servir a la Verdad».

languages.text: {n}彼は低く声を上げて笑い、首を傾げた。{/n}「その時が来たら、その約束を思い出させてやろう。運命の糸はまだ結ばれていない…我の下僕たちが、必要なものを狩るのを止めることはない。生き残れば、真理に仕える権利を得ることができよう」
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は低く声を上げて笑い、首を傾げた。{/n}「その時が来たら、その約束を思い出させてやろう。運命の糸はまだ結ばれていない…我の下僕たちが、必要なものを狩るのを止めることはない。生き残れば、真理に仕える権利を得ることができよう」

languages.text: {n}他笑了起来，歪过了头。{/n}“待时机成熟的时候，我会提醒你这个承诺。命运的肌腱尚未束牢……我不会阻止我的仆人去寻找我需要的东西。不过，如果你能活下来，你就能赢得侍奉原初真理的权利。”
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}他笑了起来，歪过了头。{/n}“待时机成熟的时候，我会提醒你这个承诺。命运的肌腱尚未束牢……我不会阻止我的仆人去寻找我需要的东西。不过，如果你能活下来，你就能赢得侍奉原初真理的权利。”

languages.text: {n}Il s'esclaffe et incline la tête.{/n} « Lorsque l'heure sera venue, je ne manquerai pas de vous rappeler votre engagement, mais les fils du destin ne sont pas encore tissés... mes serviteurs continueront à traquer ce qui me revient. En survivant, vous gagnerez le droit de vous mettre au service de la Vérité. »
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il s'esclaffe et incline la tête.{/n} « Lorsque l'heure sera venue, je ne manquerai pas de vous rappeler votre engagement, mais les fils du destin ne sont pas encore tissés... mes serviteurs continueront à traquer ce qui me revient. En survivant, vous gagnerez le droit de vous mettre au service de la Vérité. »

languages.text: {n}Er lacht und neigt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich werde Euch zu gegebener Zeit an dieses Versprechen erinnern. Die Sehnen des Schicksals sind noch nicht gebunden ... Ich werde meine Diener nicht davon abhalten, zu jagen, was ich benötige. Wenn Ihr überlebt, habt Ihr Euch das Recht verdient, der Wahrheit zu dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lacht und neigt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich werde Euch zu gegebener Zeit an dieses Versprechen erinnern. Die Sehnen des Schicksals sind noch nicht gebunden ... Ich werde meine Diener nicht davon abhalten, zu jagen, was ich benötige. Wenn Ihr überlebt, habt Ihr Euch das Recht verdient, der Wahrheit zu dienen."

languages.text: {n}Gülerek başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "O gün geldiğinde bu sözünü hatırlatacağım. Kaderin ağları henüz örülmedi... Hizmetkârlarıma verdiğim emri geri çekmeyeceğim. İhtiyacım olanı alıp bana getirecekler. Hayatta kalırsan Hakikat'e hizmet etme hakkını elde edersin."
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles and inclines his head.{/n} "When the time comes, I will remind you of this promise. The sinews of fate have yet to be bound... I will not stop my servants from hunting for that which I require. If you survive, you will have earned the right to serve the Truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gülerek başını öne eğiyor.{/n} “O gün geldiğinde bu sözünü hatırlatacağım. Kaderin ipleri henüz örülmedi... Hizmetkârlarıma verdiğim emri geri çekmeyeceğim. İhtiyaç duyduğum şeyi geri getirecekler. Hayatta kalırsan Hakikat’e hizmet etme hakkını elde etmiş olursun.”
